trans-unit.source: Provides the page adapter class for the WML device adapter set specifically designed for Openwave's UP browser.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce la classe di adattatori di pagina per il set di adattatori di periferica WML, progettati specificamente per il browser Openwave UP.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni sullo sviluppo di applicazioni mobili ASP.NET, vedere <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see> (App per dispositivi mobili e siti con ASP.NET).

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: per il funzionamento in un ambiente host.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore richiesta: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; valore autorizzazione: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.UpWmlPageAdapter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.UpWmlPageAdapter" />.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Questo API è obsoleto.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: The text writer.
trans-unit.target: Writer di testo.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a text writer suitable for the given adapters.
trans-unit.target: Crea e restituisce un writer di testo appropriato per gli adattatori specificati.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Questo API è obsoleto.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni sullo sviluppo di applicazioni mobili ASP.NET, vedere <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see> (App per dispositivi mobili e siti con ASP.NET).

trans-unit.source: A text writer suitable for the given adapters.
trans-unit.target: Writer di testo appropriato per gli adattatori specificati.

trans-unit.source: The current request context.
trans-unit.target: Contesto della richiesta corrente.

trans-unit.source: Evaluates whether the device adapter set applies to the specified request.
trans-unit.target: Valuta se il set di adattatori di dispositivo è applicabile alla richiesta specificata.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Questo API è obsoleto.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni sullo sviluppo di applicazioni mobili ASP.NET, vedere <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see> (App per dispositivi mobili e siti con ASP.NET).

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the device adapter set applies to the specified request; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il set di adattatori di periferica è applicabile alla richiesta specificata e <see langword="false" /> altrimenti.

trans-unit.source: Class
trans-unit.target: Classe

trans-unit.source: Returns
trans-unit.target: Valore restituito

trans-unit.source: Preferred rendering type
trans-unit.target: Tipo di rendering preferito

trans-unit.source: Check value of JavaScript property
trans-unit.target: Valore di controllo di proprietà JavaScript.

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> property is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.
trans-unit.target: Controlla se il valore di <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> proprietà <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> o <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> restituisce `true`.

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> property is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.
trans-unit.target: Controlla se il valore di <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> proprietà <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> o <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> restituisce `false`.

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> property is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12>.
trans-unit.target: Controlla se il valore di <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> proprietà <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11> o <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12>.

trans-unit.source: Not applicable.
trans-unit.target: Non applicabile.
